description:
Made with 100 % recycled polyester sherpa fleece, this jacket provides excellent insulation while remaining lightweight and comfortable. The Sorbtek® mesh lining effectively manages moistur to stay dry during intense activities.

For added durability and discretion, the forearms and shoulders are reinforced with a silent fabric. You will be able to navigate through rugged terrain and brush without compromising stealth.

This garment also features two front-loading game bag pockets that can serve as hand warmers, keeping your hands cozy during those early morning hunts. The YKK® coil zipper with a semi-automatic lock slider minimizes noise, allowing for discreet and quiet movement in the field. To enhance flexibility and comfort, the jacket is finished with stretch bias cuffs, pockets, and hem.
name: Hooke Mossy Sherpa Fleece - Mens
